block_comment: This block is aimed at synchronizing a Pause Timer signal in relation to either MTxClk clock signal or a TxReset signal. Upon every positive edge of the MTxClk clock or the TxReset signal, if the TxReset is activated (high), the PauseTimerEq0_sync1 and PauseTimerEq0_sync2 both reset synchronously. In the absence of reset, PauseTimerEq0_sync1 follows the 'PauseTimerEq0' signal and PauseTimerEq0_sync2 follows the 'PauseTimerEq0_sync1' signal, thus creating a two-stage synchronizer for the 'PauseTimerEq0' signal.
